result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Email correspondence with parties. Upon Attorney Zwach's appointment to case, Court vacates Order To Show Cause Hearing previously calendared and re-calendars matter for a Status Conference date on 12/02/2022 at 01:30 pm, Br 16.
Received and Signed. Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense

Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch in court.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Status of Counsel hearing. The PD's Office needs additional time to appoint counsel. Court held colloquy with defendant. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Defendant requested court appoint counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense of $ 60.00 upon completion of case. Court will seek court appointed counsel and orders matter adjourned for an order to show cause hearing in Branch 16.
Order to show cause hearing scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Report 10.31.22

Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch in court.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Status of Counsel hearing. The PD's Office needs additional time to appoint counsel. Court orders matter adjourned for a status of counsel hearing in Branch 16.
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 10-11-22
Received and Filed. Notice of Completion

Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Connor Romenesko appeared by video for Gionlo Jermain Finch.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference. Defendant has three other cases; 22CF3477, 22CF2965, 21CM1917. Counsel informed Court there has been a breakdown in communication.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 16; VIA ZOOM. Status conference scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk
Received and Filed. Pretrial Status Report 09-13-2022
Received and Filed. NOTICE OF MOTION AND MOTION TO WITHDRAW AS COUNSEL FOR DEFENDANT

Pretrial Violation Report , filed
New criminal charges filed
Received and Filed. Pretrial Violation Report 08-03-2022

Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Defense counsel informs court that they have received discovery. Further defense is still awaiting an offer from the state, due to possible global resolution with new pending case. Court adjourns matter for a Status Conference to Br 16.  Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Supervision Report 08-01-2022
Signature bond re-instated event of 06/02/2022 reflects corrected event name.

Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch in court, appar by video with attorney Connor Romenesko, appear by video.  Karine O'Byrne appeared by videofor the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: West Allis Officer I. Olson     State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 16.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Public Defender Order Appointing Counsel
Received and Filed. Pretrial Supervision Report 06-06-2022
Received and Filed. Pretrial Status Report 06-06-2022
Court orders previous conditions to remain in full force and effect.

Prior: 2111 North 34th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53208

Attorney Connor Romenesko in court, defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch not in court, in custody.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Return on Warrant. Defendant not produced. Arguments heard as to bail. Court re-instates $ 1,000.00 signature bond with other conditions. Case adjourned to Prelim Court.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court is in receipt of a warrant regarding this defendant. A return on warrant hearing has been scheduled with parties for June 2nd, 2022 at 8:30 am before branch 17.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant. ($1,000.00 signature bond) LW
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 1000.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch not in court.  Adam Joseph Best appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant having failed to appear with the conditions of his release, the court ordered a bench warrant to issue, any bond forfeited and Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification by the Clerk of Circuit Court.
Received and Filed.Pretrial Supervision Report 05-16-2022

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Gionlo Jermain Finch appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Gionlo Jermain Finch not in court.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. The forfeiture order is stayed for 30 days pending notice to the defendant. Court makes a finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, restitution is not an issue.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 4/15/22 @ 1:30p
